newsitem.title: COLOMBIA: Colombia net foreign reserves $10.3 bln at July 11.
newsitem.headline: Colombia net foreign reserves $10.3 bln at July 11.

text.p: Colombia's net foreign reserves stood at $10.3 billion as of July 11, the last date for which figures are available, the central bank said Monday.
Reserves grew $4.4 million from July 4, the bank said.
In the year to July 11, net foreign reserves grew $409.8 million, it said.
Gross foreign reserves stood at $10.61 billion as of July 11, up from $10.58 billion on July 4, a statement by the central bank said.
The bank expects the year-on-year growth in net reserves to be about $750 million this year, it said.
